data.description: Perl module to parse ANSI X12 data
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
X12 data format is widely used for e-business transactions (EDI).
    X12 standards are maintained by ASC and registered with ANSI. X12
    format also known as ASC X12 or ANSI X12.

    X12 format more known now as HIPAA regulations require the
    Healthcare industry to use the ANSI X12 transaction formats.

    Similar to HTML and XML, X12 format is widely used. Currently there
    is no open source parser available to handle this data format. My
    module is a valiant attempt to parse these formats in simple and
    effective way.

    Two namespaces are requested X12::Parser and X12::Parser::Cf.
    X12::Parser::Cf is used by X12::Parser.
